snippet: As the games wrapped up on the final day of the regular season, questions about who would go where for baseball’s postseason were finally answered.
abstract: MLB playoff schedule emerges as games wrap up on the final day of the regular season; New York Yankees traveling secretary Ben Tuliebitz says this year’s postseason push has been the most hectic in his six seasons in the job.

byline.original: By BENJAMIN HOFFMAN and ZACH SCHONBRUN

lead_paragraph: As the games wrapped up on the final day of the regular season, questions about who would go where for baseball’s postseason were finally answered.

headline.seo: Baseball’s Travel Plans Emerge as Playoff Chaos Ends
headline.main: As Chaos Subsides, a Schedule Emerges
headline.print_headline: As Chaos Subsides, A Schedule Emerges
